Chapter 3: With a Light Heart

Now appealing to the Council, Nyx and Juni must prove that they pose no threat to the assembled leaders before they can receive help. Fyora calls for a Light Faerie with a unique power to help shed some light on the predicament.

Players will earn prizes, and plot points, by participating in the storyline throughout the plot itself. Some prizes will be earned by playing mini games and/or via the Battledome.

Quick Navigation

Steps

Page One

Head to The Void Within home page, click on Chapter 3: With a Light Heart and click through all panels on the comic to claim your frist prize.

Prize

Clicking through all panels will reward you with a brand new prize.

Page Two

Our heroes have made it to the council, while some seem eager to help, others not so much...

Prize

Clicking through all panels will reward you with a brand new prize.

Page Three

Nyx reveals a device to Dr. Landelbrot that could be of some use.

Prize

Clicking through all panels will reward you with a brand new prize.

Orion's Vision

On day three of the Altador cup Orion appeared in the news section on the AC homepage where announcers Sigmir and Sweet would be. He announced that his visions have returned and were once again weak & distorted. Since large gatherings of people is what help his visions become vivid, AC was the place to go. Orion then requests your help. Upon agreeing you are met with a image similar to how Mystery Picture functions & must solve where it is leading to. For more information, please view our Orion's Visions guide.

Page Four

Fyora interjects the commotion to try and calm things down, what could her suggestion be?

Prize

Clicking through all panels will reward you with a brand new prize.

Page Five

Fyora calls in aid from an familiar face, Luxinia!

Prize

Clicking anywhere on the panel will reward you with a brand new prize.

Page Six

While the council have started to argue about the appearance of Nyx & Juni, Fyora stands up and calls in her friend Luxinia to help. She believes that our light faerie friend might just have an ability that could be useful for the current situation. You can read all plot dialogue here.

Page Seven

Luxinia offers her hand out to Nyx in hopes that her findings will help the situation.

Prize

Clicking through all panels will reward you with a brand new prize.

Page Eight

Nyx accepts Luxinia's hand & allows her to see a glimspe of her memories.

Prize

Clicking through all panels will reward you with a brand new prize.

Page Nine

Luxinia continues to dive into Nyx's memories.

Prize

Clicking through all panels will reward you with a brand new prize.

Page Ten

Luxinia starts to discovers the truth regarding Nyx's claims of where her strange device came from.

Prize

Clicking through all panels will reward you with a brand new prize.

Page Eleven

Luxinia finishes reading through Nyx's memories and is moved by the events our two new friends had to deal with.

Prize

Clicking anywhere on the panel will reward you with a brand new prize.

Page Twelve

After reading through Nyx's memories the Council decides they should help these two out, unfortunately some still have their concerns. You can read all plot dialogue here.

Page Thirteen

Nyx starts work with Dr. Landelbrot to figure out how Juni built her device.

Prize

Clicking anywhere on the panel will reward you with a brand new prize.
